Ben Leskey's Blog: cdda_erik cdda_erik posts from Ben Leskey https://benleskey.com/blog/tags/cdda_erik en-us 2023 Ben Leskey Sun, 05 Feb 2023 22:29:44 +0000 Sun, 05 Feb 2023 22:29:44 +0000
Erik Otto #1: Used car cult salesman Intro It’s time for a new Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead let’s play! Erik Otto is a former used car salesman shunted away to one of the many FEMA evacuation shelters during the end of the world. He’s extremely intelligent, very sociable, and attractive. If he hadn’t been a used car salesman, he always thought that he’d make a good cult leader. Well, now that the apocalypse has arrived, now is the chance for the Cult of Erik to arise. This character is designed to attract NPCs and become a sort of hub for an NPC enclave.
